content:
Sorry for this late declaration. Due to current job postion’s contract agreement, I stop keep updating this blog. I understand it’s a pity, but this’s

Sorry for this late declaration.

Due to current job postion’s contract agreement, I stop keep updating this blog.

I understand it’s a pity, but this’s the real life.

Thanks for keep understanding each other.

Backuper

Mar 2012
